snippet: A former Egyptian lawmaker who threatened on a popular TV show that Americans would be "slaughtered in their homes" if an attempt is made on the life of the country's military chief recanted on Sunday, saying his comments were misconstrued....

headline.print_headline: Egypt: Former Official Under Fire for US Comments
headline.main: Egypt: Former Official Under Fire for US Comments

lead_paragraph: A former Egyptian lawmaker who threatened on a popular TV show that Americans would be "slaughtered in their homes" if an attempt is made on the life of the country's military chief recanted on Sunday, saying his comments were misconstrued.
